name: Deluxe Room
description: Spacious room with a view of the city skyline. Includes a king-sized bed and modern amenities.

description: Luxurious suite with a stunning ocean view. Features a private balcony and deluxe furnishings.

name: Family Suite
description: Perfect for families, this suite offers multiple bedrooms and a spacious living area.

name: Executive Suite
description: Elegant suite designed for business travelers. Offers a dedicated workspace and premium services.

description: Intimate room with a cozy atmosphere, perfect for couples seeking a romantic escape.

name: Penthouse Suite
description: Luxury at its finest. Offers breathtaking views and top-tier amenities.

name: Standard Room
description: Comfortable room with essential amenities for a relaxing stay.

name: Vintage Charm
description: Classic room with a vintage touch, exuding old-world charm.
